readable.title: Up
readable.description: The monitor is up and running. No errors have been logged nor detected.

for_platform.description: All services are running with no reported errors.

readable.title: Down
readable.description: The monitor is down and the services it serves might be temporarily offline or unavailable.

for_platform.description: Some monitors on our platform are currently down. We are working hard to fix this.

readable.title: Partial outage
readable.description: The monitor is experiencing a partial outage. Some of the services it serves might be temporarily offline or unavailable.

for_platform.description: The platform is experiencing a partial outage. The availability of some services might be degraded.

readable.title: Degraded performance
readable.description: The monitor is experiencing degraded performance. Some of the services it serves might be temporarily unavailable or serve slower than expected.

for_platform.description: The platform is experiencing degraded performance. The availability of some services might be degraded.

readable.title: Under maintenance
readable.description: The monitor is under maintenance. Check for messages from our team about it. Services that it serves might be temporarily unavailable.

for_platform.description: The platform is currently under maintanence.
